comment: Amazing professor, he's definitely passionate about what he teaches and the benefits of programming thinking! I absolutely love the way the class is structured. It's refined in a way where it's a stress-free learning environment where these important topics will stick with you throughout your comp sci career.

Good professor, easy class overall. There are weekly quizzes over the module topics, 2 attempts per quiz and no lockdown browser for tests or quizzes. His online class provides lecture videos that were recorded during in-person classes, so you get to see him working out problems that may have confused you on the quiz. There was 1 project - easy.

Professor Rutherfoord is the best math teacher I've ever had. He made discrete math seem so simple. There is a textbook and links to other materials within the course, but they were unnecessary. All I needed was to watch Rutherfoord's lectures and do the associated homework. He is one of the best instructors at KSU. If only they were all this good!

One of the best teachers I ever had. He actually WANTS you to learn so he creates a no pressure environment. The way class goes is lecture, take quiz/test, review quiz/test next class, retake quiz/test. I felt that I learned easier and a lot more in this class than with teachers that are the opposite of him. He makes the class easy AND you learn.
You can tell he really cares. Great lectures. If you have the opportunity to take him, definitely do.

He's a really nice professor, very accessible. The class itself is very straightforward and he makes it pretty easy. The only frustrating thing is that his online materials are a little disorganized, lots of broken links, and sometimes it wasn't clear which units were covered on a specific quiz but two attempts per quiz make it a non-issue.

I've taken this prof before and he's great, but this course was a bit different. Still easy though. It uses a pretty old online textbook that hasn't been updated so some of the links don't work. Easy group project. Easy quizzes. For every module you have to write a paper, but don't sweat it's 1 pax max. Definitely read the textbook.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: A man who needs no introduction. Legendary. Great lectures. Accessible outside of class via email. Very understanding. The class may not click for some people but he provides a ton of youtube resources to get your brain working. I wish he taught more classes.

Absolutely take his class if you can. His tests aren't timed and you don't have to use Lockdown Browser, so you can work at your own pace. You also get two attempts on every test and quiz. There is a group project, which is the most difficult part of his class, but it's not too bad. His lectures are also fantastic, make sure you watch them.

Professor Rutherfoord's CSE3801 class is straightforward, and it's not very difficult. There are quite a few assignments, but they're mostly all opinion. If you do all your work, you'll do well in the class. He is not a difficult grader.

The BEST online / in course professor. He records his in course lectures and goes over the quizzes in class. He's literally amazing. I'm currently taking him for online and he's super flexible, responds fast and is super helpful. Take him for every class that you possibly can.
The dream professor. Great professor if you want to learn, but also an extremely easy class with two tries on exams/quizzes. Attendance not needed at all, class is already set up to be mostly online.

EASY A, TAKE HIM!! There's three exams, no final, a few quizzes, one project. quizzes and exams have two attempts so 100 is guaranteed. i stopped going to class after a while but still got an A cause everything was online. no lockdown no webcam! project is a little tricky but use your resources!!!!! also he's so so sweet.

He is a great professor, his class includes quizzes, test, and a final project. He also record his lecture and you can see them on your own time. Friendly professor, I recommend him if you need to take any CSE class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Get ready to read

comment: He was an amazing teacher. He uploads his lectures onto D2L so online students can watch them. He gives two chances on quizzes and tests which is nice too. The term project I was unable to finish (I barely did any coding for it) and I still got a passing grade on it. He is super chill and will help you when you need it.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Rutherfoord is one of the most caring professors I have taken. He uploads his in-class lectures to D2L and thoroughly explains each module. He provides two attempts on quizzes and exams (even the final), which are all fairly easy. Please take him if you can! It will be one of the most fun and easy CSE courses you take!
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I took this class online, and it could not have been easier. We read through the entire book and answered questions at the end of every chapter. We also had a group project that was an application of what we learned in the class, but it wasn't too difficult because I had a great group. I recommend taking Dr. Rutherfoord, he is a great teacher.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: Really enjoyed this class. Mr. Rutherfoord is awesome, definitely would take again. He's more concerned with you understanding the material than with memorizing.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Rutherfoord is an amazing professor. He lays out everything clear cut. The only hard thing in his class was the term project which was about sorting algorithms in coding. Just had to do some research for the sorting algorithms and I understood it. Made a 94 in his class.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: You want this professor. Don't think you can't still learn the material just because it's an easy A. There's plenty of material to read/watch for those who want to learn and be successful.

Take him if you don't want to learn anything. His reviews all have "5" because he literally gives you an "A". The majority of lectures are him giving you test and quiz answers before you take it. After you take a test or quiz you can take it again even though d2l gives you all the answers. The final project is literally a lab I had in CSE 1102.
rating_tags: TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Only quizzes, tests, and final project for this class. The great thing that I have never experienced with other online classes was that he videotaped his lectures and post them for online students which helped a great deal. Not only that, his teaching is superb. I understood all the material he went over.
In simple words, He is the Best and amazing. He is an easy A.

Awesome Professor! He really cares about his students learning the material. He provides his recorded in class lectures for his online students to review. Provides many examples and helpful tools to help you learn the material. If I could take him for all my remaining courses I would. He is simply the BEST! I highly recommend taking him.

The ideal online class. You can literally finish all of the coursework for the ENTIRE semester in 3 days, then submit it when the d2l deadlines roll in. Pay attention to the lectures and read over the Powerpoint, and you will learn a lot.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: The best professor you will ever take in your life, truly cares about his students and is the nicest human alive. Pay attention in lectures, you will learn a lot. Provides great history lessons as well.
Best Teacher ever, Always take this teacher for any class. You'll actually learn and his quizzes are easy. Each quiz is two attempts and you'll be thankful for taking this teacher.
much quiz such answer very nice 420/69 would take again

Best professor you will take. I usually don't do review but this professor is worth reviewing. He actually wants you learn rather than passing or completing the course. He has 2 attempts to his online quizzes and he usually goes over the quizzes on Wednesdays. Final 2 attempts too. Forgot to do a quiz, he will extend it for you.   Just do it!

What an amazing teacher. I took his class online and it was so informative and he really went through a lot of work to make sure there was more than enough material to help out the students.  Also, each week he would post a lecture that he recorded in class. It was almost like having the classroom experience but online.

We met on Friday once a week. Although class was said to be about 3 hrs, he usually dismissed class within an hour. Very easy class and great teacher! Take him, you won't regret it! You will learn a lot. No HW, a very easy project that basically tells you what to do, several online quizzes/tests that you can take multiple times, and a notes log.

By far one of the best teachers I've had so far. There's a decent amount of quizzes, but they are all online and can be taken at home. There is one project but it's really easy to do. He really cares that your learning the material in the class and is always willing to help. Take him if you can you won't regret it.

I really enjoyed taking Prof. Rutherfoord's CSE2300 class. He is very clear in what he expects, he is very easy to talk to, and he is an excellent professor. He adapts his lectures to fit with modern learning styles. I learned a lot from his class because his teaching style was fantastic and really catered to how I learn best.

The best professor I've had in my college career thus far. He goes out of his way to make sure you understand the material, and presents it in a way that is as easy as possible to understand. All quizzes and tests are online and goes over them in class.

Had him for Discrete Structures, which isn't an easy class.  He truly cares and is a firm believer in the students' learning, not grades.  Best teacher I have ever had hands down.  I learned more in his class in 2 weeks then the whole previous semester when I took it.   Can't say enough about this teacher.  GET HIM IF POSSIBLE!
